product_name: Turtle Fur Vermontur Powderhorn Earflap Hat - Men's - Special Buy
long_description: This handcrafted Turtle Fur Vermontur Powderhorn Earflap wool hat is lined with warm fleece for cold-weather comfort. Wool insulates efficiently, regulates temperature effectively, sheds water and resists wind. Turtle Fur polyester fleece lining provides an extra-soft heat-trapping layer for superb comfort next to skin. Special buy.
short_description: This handcrafted Turtle Fur Vermontur Powderhorn Earflap wool hat is lined with warm fleece for cold-weather comfort.
